ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.2.0 on 2024-11-30T20:44:42 [Issue ID 4000-97195] urn:comicvine:4000-97195
ComicInfo.Summary: FeFo#68 All Color!!! The old spirit's mystic meddlimg (seen in last issue's Black Phantom back-up ) has sent ripples through the entire AC universe. As the now-enchanted 'Phantom is magically brought into the present, The Green Lama is filled with malevolent energy, She-Cat is possesssed by Sehkmet, The Hood loses control of his ectoplasmic weapons, and Alizarin Crimson breaks out of prison. With 'Crimson to add to the magical mayhem, things just get worse, as she casts a spell on the Shade, and has him attack Nightveil. It takes The Haunted Horseman to sort things out. "Nightveil Spellbound" is written by Bill Black, drawn by Greg(Espers)Horn, and inked by Nar Castro, Sonny delos Santos, and Mark Heike. It guest stars Dr. Jonathan(Purple Claw)Weir and Buckaroo Betty. Then, Colt is back in the back-up, as she meets General Gordon's stooge, to hand over the secret documents she stole for him- but things don't go down the way she expected. "An Interlude For A Happy General", is scripted and drawn by Don Secrease, and plotted and inked by Mark Heike. Color cover by Greg Horn and Mark Heike, full color throughout. Standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: Nightveil Spellbound
